thread.title: Man charged in fatal Lake Shore Drive crash - Chicago Tribune
thread.title_full: Man charged in fatal Lake Shore Drive crash - Chicago Tribune

author: Megan Crepeau
title: Man charged in fatal Lake Shore Drive crash - Chicago Tribune
text:
A Lakeview man has been charged with reckless homicide after police said he hit two pedestrians with his motorcycle, killing one, according to a news release from Chicago police.
On Monday night, Charles Lyons, 20, was speeding on a motorcycle in the 600 block of South Lake Shore Drive and didnâ€™t stop at a red light, police said. A 25-year-old woman and 40-year-old man were hit in the crosswalk; he was seriously injured and she was killed.
Lyons, of the 800 block of West George Street, was charged with reckless homicide and aggravated reckless driving, both felonies. He is expected to appear in court Saturday.
